name: Affirmation Frog
description:
Just a simple softwere for bad days. Click on a frog to see afirmations <3

 The world seems to be an unforgiving place. That is why I created this small app, to cheer people up! Maybe it's not much, but it's something I hope. This app is trans and queer friendly, so if someone have some issues, please resolve them somwhere else.  

here is a link for a web version: 
https://liluo.io/instant-builds/335826d8-5342-46db-8146-e09917f1f5b5

If you have any sugestion on further expanding this app, please let me know! I would like to add more affirmations. One for every day! I also think about adding some easter eggs maybe?
